title: Adding an elseif Block
description:
Like the last problem, decide if a number is positive, negative, or zero. Only this time you won't use a nested if-else block, you will use the elseif block with a boolean expression instead.

if value > 0
elseif true
else
end
hint: The program already finds a positive number so add an elseif block to the if else block. Next, type a boolean expression to decide if the value is a negative number. Then add the output blocks for the elseif scope and the else scope. Then run the program with the value variable having a value of -2, 0, and 2 to test your program.
